display_help: The Ring of Pain is a dark device. It can severely reduce a target's Defense, at the cost of the owner's health. As the target's Defense is lowered, you will continue to lose Hit Points until you deactivate the ring. The Ring of Pain can remain active for about 10 minutes before it is exhausted of its negative energy. Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The spell of the Ring of Pain is reducing your Defenses.
display_attacker_hit: Ring of Pain severely reduces the defense of {PlayerDest}, but continue drains you of Hit Points as long as it is active.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
